title: FBI RECORDS FOR BARTHOLOMEW T MAZZARA

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records mentioning, relating to, or generated as a result of investigation into Bartholomew "Bart" T. Mazzara. 

In addition to conducting this search for records at the FBI Field Office in Buffalo, NY, please conduct an additional search of the Central Records System, including but not limited to the Electronic Surveillance (ELSUR) Indices, the Microphone Surveillance (MISUR) Indices, the Physical Surveillance (FISUR) Indices, and the Technical Surveillance (TESUR) Indices, for both main-file records and cross-reference records for all relevant names, individuals, agencies and companies at FBI Headquarters. Please also conduct a search for records at the Alexandria Records Center. If any potentially responsive records have been destroyed and/or transferred to NARA, then I request copies of the destruction or transfer slips as well as any other documentation relating to, mentioning or describing said transfer or destruction, to include but not be limited to confirmation that the Bureau has no other copies of said records. If previously released records are available, then I request a rolling release consisting of those records while additional records are located and processed for release.

Bart's DOB: 1/17/1941. See: https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112825753/bart-t-mazzara
Bart's DOD:  10/25/2003.  See: https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/112825753/bart-t-mazzara

Bart Mazzara was accused of assaulting and FBI Agent. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-bart-mazzara-arrested-f/119538441/

Bart Mazzara was convicted of a Taven Beating along with Vic Sansanese, Dan Sansanese, Jr,  and Joseph Rosato. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-mazzara-sansanese-and/119820758/

Bart Acquitted  of his alleged role in a Bank Loan Racketeering Trial. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-bart-mazzara-aquited-in/147940343/

Additionally, Mazzara was close with the deceased LCN/Underworld Figures listed below. Please ensure these names are not redacted.. 

1. Frank "Butch" BiFulco (Buffalo LCN Family). BiFulco's DOD is October 12, 2020. See: https://buffalonews.com/obituaries/frank-butch-bifulco-75-reputed-mobster-with-a-brilliant-mind/article_1165f678-1ab8-11eb-a55c-130105cb65b9.html See also: https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/buffalonews/name/frank-bifulco-obituary?id=4880120

2. Daniel Sansanese, JR; DOD: 6/16/2003.  See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-daniel-j-s/148762604/

3. Joseph Rosato; DOD: 2/9/2008. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-joseph-p-rosato-obitua/148755252/

4. John  "Johnny Catz" Cantanzaro; DOD: 11/10/2004. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-john-r/148756356/

5. Albert M "Babe" Billiteri; DOD: 5/16/1998. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-albert-m-b/148763284/

6. Frank T Billiteri; DOD: 4/3/2010.  See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-thomas-bil/148759129/

7. Anthony LoCurto; DOD: 6/14/2022. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-anthony-nini-locurto/148758346/

8. Mark Russo; DOD: 6/10/1998. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-mark-j/148758618/

9. Frank "Chicky Bots" Grisanti; DOD: 5/21/2011. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-frank-gris/148762219/

10. Nicholas "Sonny" Mauro; DOD: 6/22/2005. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-nicholas-a/148765250/

11. Russell Hymo Amsden; DOD: 2/9/2005. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-russell-t/148762389/

12. William Sciolino; DOD: 3/7/1980.  See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-william-m/148765688/

13. Ronald Raccia; DOD: 9/28/2010. See: https://buffalonews.newspapers.com/article/the-buffalo-news-obituary-for-raccuiaval/148765934/


Please make sure the deceased with the above mentioned names are not redacted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mob
